# Aura

> Themed cursor shadows for the web. An npm package that replaces default browser cursors with macOS-style SVG cursors that have colored drop shadows.

Aura works with React and vanilla JavaScript. It generates custom SVG cursors with baked-in shadows and applies them via CSS custom properties. No runtime overhead â€” just static CSS after the initial render.

## Installation

    npm install cursor-aura

## React

    import { Aura } from 'cursor-aura'

    <Aura color="#0C3EFF" />

Accepts hex, rgb, hsl, or a CSS variable like `var(--theme-color)`.

## Vanilla JS

    import { AuraVanilla as Aura } from 'cursor-aura/vanilla'

    Aura.init({ color: '#0C3EFF' })
    Aura.setColor('#FF6183')
    Aura.destroy()
